devdoc.author: Nathan Cinnamond

params.amount: : amount paid out to owner in commission
: amount paid out to better (original stake plus profit)
params.fixtureID: : corresponding fixtureID for fixture on outcome which better claims payout

params.amount: : amount added to total amount staked by better on fixture outcome
params.betType: : outcome of fixtureID that better has staked on
params.fixtureID: : corresponding fixtureID for fixture on which outcome is staked

params.amount: : amount subtracted from total amount staked by better on fixture outcome
params.betType: : outcome of fixtureID that better has unstaked on
params.fixtureID: : corresponding fixtureID for fixture on which outcome is unstaked
: the corresponding fixtureID for fixture that has state change
params.state: : the BettingState corresponding to the new state of the fixture

params.fixtureID: : corresponding fixtureID for fixture with kickoff time fulfilled
params.kickoffTime: : unix timestamp of kickoff time for fixture

params.fixtureID: : the corresponding fixtureID for fixture to be set to AWAITING
: the corresponding fixtureID for fixture to be closed

params.user: : Address of user corresponding to user fixture stakes

returns._0: FixtureEnrichment struct containing fixture state, user stakes and total stakes

params.fixtureID: : Corresponding fixtureID for fixture owner withdraws commission for
: the corresponding fixtureID for fixture to be opened
: Corresponding fixtureID for fixture user requests kickoff time for
: Corresponding fixtureID for fixture user requests result for

params.amount: : The amount of collateral added to user's total stake on fixture outcome
params.betType: : The fixture outcome the msg sender is staking on
params.fixtureID: : Corresponding fixtureID for fixture user is staking on

params.amount: : The amount of collateral subtracted from user's total stake on fixture outcome
params.betType: : The fixture outcome the msg sender is unstaking on
params.fixtureID: : Corresponding fixtureID for fixture user is unstaking on
: Corresponding fixtureID for fixture user withdraws winnings for

devdoc.title: A contract for sports result staking

BetCommissionPayout(string,uint256).notice: Event emitted each time owner claims commission on bet payout profits

BetPayout(address,string,uint256).notice: Event emitted each time a user claims payout on fixture result

BetStaked(address,string,uint256,uint8).notice: Event emitted each time a user stakes on a fixture outcome

BetUnstaked(address,string,uint256,uint8.notice: Event emitted each time a user unstakes on a fixture outcome

BettingStateChanged(string,uint8).notice: Event emitted each time the betting state for a fixture changes

KickoffTimeUpdated(string,uint256).notice: Event emitted each time a fixture kickoff time is fulfilled by oracle

awaitBetForFixture(string).notice: Changes fixture betting state to AWAITING if eligible

closeBetForFixture(string).notice: Closes fixture if it is 1. Not currently closed AND 2. eligible to be closed

getEnrichedFixtureData(string,address).notice: Gets total and user stakes on all outcomes for fixture

handleCommissionPayout(string).notice: Transfers owner commission on fixture if applicable

openBetForFixture(string).notice: Makes oracle request to get fixture kickoff time and set fixture state to OPENINGOn fulfillment handle, ctx will open fixture is eligible

requestFixtureKickoffTime(string).notice: Calls consumer contract to request fixture kickoff time from oracle

requestFixtureKickoffTimeParameter(strin.notice: Request fixture kickoff time from the oracle in a single transaction

requestFixtureResult(string).notice: Calls consumer contract to request fixture result from oracle

requestFixtureResultParameter(string).notice: Request fixture result from the oracle in a single transaction

stake(string,uint8,uint256).notice: Allows user to stake on fixture with ID fixtureID for outcome 'betType' with 'amount'

unstake(string,uint8,uint256).notice: Allows user to unstake on fixture with ID fixtureID for outcome 'betType' with 'amount'

withdrawLink(uint256).notice: Allow withdraw of Link tokens from the contract

withdrawPayout(string).notice: Transfers user winnings on fixture if applicable

userdoc.notice: Handles user stakes and allows winning stakers to claim payouts
